titleStmt.title: The scrupler's case considered, or, The unreasonableness of refusing the oaths of allegiance to K. William and Q. Mary evinced

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for Henry Mortlock ...,

notesStmt.note: A pamphlet on the question of allegiance to William and Mary and on the doctrine of the Trinity, 1689-1693.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
